body: It's not ntr, it's called netorase. It's their term for cuck, but I think with a better name. Cuck has such a nasty ring to it. A lot of kink shaming going on with that word.
This is the best. I don't consider this NTR.
No, this is cuckolding in the most literal sense. She loves watching her partner getting fucked by another man. You're just too used to super-depressing NTR that typically involves blackmail or rape.
I don't think this counts as NTR... But its still pretty fucked up.
